Class LightBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • Box
        • LightBox

  • public class LightBox
extends Box
    The LightBox creates a box that lights up in random colors

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LightBox(int givenValue)
      Creates the LightBox with a given image value and a random color

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void act()
      Changes the color of the LightBox to a random color
      java.awt.Color getColor()
      Gets the color of the Light Box return the color of the LightBox
      java.lang.String getImageSuffix()
      Used to determine which box corner should be displayed for this LightBox object.
